content: **materials** this pattern uses the following medium weight baiyou beginner yarn in sage green yellow or glow-in-the-dark optional black 2 × 10mm safety eyes stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round unless otherwise noted rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase increase invisible decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain skip stitch skip st back loop only blo front loop only flo surface crochet fasten_off invisible fasten_off embroidery
